sentence.Network_en: He informed us with massive understatement that he was feeling disappointed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他极力轻描淡写地跟我们说他感到失望。

sentence.Network_en: To say he wasn't amused must be the understatement of the year.
sentence.Network_cn: 说他不感兴趣肯定说轻了.
“ 有一点奇怪”绝对是轻描淡写.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 正低调陈述(Understatement)是英语中常见的修辞方法。这种修辞格故意使用有节制的措辞来陈述事实,借用低调与弱化语言形式来表 …
英国人的“轻描淡写”：英式的“轻描淡写（understatement）”把惊人之事说得平淡无奇，把激动化为无动于衷。如果一个人曾荣获网球 …
伦敦（英国）人好在他们有种低调（understatement）、有种秩序；巴黎人则是渲染的，第一时间就要让你知道。从建筑就很明显， …
听陈琦老师在耳边念答案 ... A. invective 咒骂 B. understatement 掩饰 C. parsimony 吝啬.

list.abs: not the word for it不恰当的字眼 an understatementThey kept me waiting for half an hour—“annoyed” wa.
to say the film was bad is an understatement .说这部影片不好是比较温和的说法。
To call this CD amazingly satisfying is a gross understatement ., 称这张 CD 令人惊叹与满意只是一个保守说法.

instead of competing to host the most lavish beach parties , as they have in previous years , agencies are trying to outdo each other with understatement .广告代理公司们没有像前些年那样竞相主办最奢华的沙滩派对，而是都在试图以低调处理来胜过彼此。
...as class of adjusting entries 作为调整分录一种的预收收入understatement of 低估预收收入Unemployment taxes 失业税

entry.tran: 不充分如实的陈述；轻描淡写的说明
entry.def: If you say that a statement is an understatement, you mean that it does not fully express the extent to which something is true.

example.ex: To say I'm disappointed is an understatement...
example.tran: 说我失望那是说得太轻了。

example.ex: He was getting very hard to live with, and that's the understatement of the year.
example.tran: 说他很不好相处，那简直是说得太客气了。

entry.tran: 轻描淡写；重事轻说；淡化
entry.def: Understatement is the practice of suggesting that things have much less of a particular quality than they really have.

example.ex: He informed us with massive understatement that he was feeling disappointed.
example.tran: 他极力轻描淡写地跟我们说他感到失望。
典型的英国式轻描淡写

means.word_mean: 1. a statement that is restrained in ironic contrast to what might have been said

auth_sentence.content: To say results are variable would be an understatement.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: To say results are variable would be an understatement.

auth_sentence.content: Stone in the Water is exemplary in its understatement.

auth_sentence.content: Calling Roky Erickson a survivor is a gross understatement.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Calling Roky Erickson a survivor is a gross understatement.

sentences.cn: 说他不感兴趣肯定说轻了。

sentences.en: ‘A little strange’ is a gross understatement.
sentences.cn: “有一点奇怪”绝对是轻描淡写。
